participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and friendly, enjoys socializing and sharing interests with others.
participant_1.background: I run track. I wear glasses all day. I take medication. I love video games.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and fun-loving, has a passion for music and enjoys a good laugh.
participant_2.background: In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punkrock. I like dr pepper and black jack gum, but not together. I work in a corner grocery store during the day. My favorite show is Scooby Doo.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I work in a corner grocery store during the day and in the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.
That sounds like a fun job!
It is. I get to listen to good music all day long.
What's your favorite song?
I don't really have a favorite song, but I love all of the Ramones' songs.
I love the Ramones too! They're one of my favorite bands.
They're so good! I love their energy and their music is so catchy.
Me too. I like to go to their concerts whenever they come to town.
Me too! I've seen them a few times and they always put on a great show.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV. My favorite show is Scooby Doo.
I love Scooby Doo too! It's one of my favorite cartoons.
It's so funny! I love the way Scooby and Shaggy always get scared.
Me too! I love their friendship and how they always stick together.
They're the best! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games. I run track and take medication.
I love video games too! What's your favorite video game?
I don't really have a favorite video game, but I love all of the Mario games.
I love the Mario games too! They're so much fun. I love playing them with my friends.
Me too! I love the competition and the camaraderie.
I love the way you can work together to beat the game.
Me too! It's so much fun to work together as a team.
